data.message: Why don't you send me all the kool thing all my friends get, like the 1st of the year, and like today I didn't get the friendship showing all their friends...we joined FACEBOOK at the same time...what kinda friend is FACEBOOK?

replies.message: You don't have enough info on me...that's a joke...I'm printing out my pictures and deleting FACEBOOK,  and go to another app.  😵😵😵😵😵😵👎👎👎👎
Hi Tia. Unfortunately not everyone has enough content to populate a Friends Day video. We hope over time we'll be able to give these kinds of experiences to more and more people. -Jessica
I've been with you for years.
You also have to tap on where it says " Show me mine"
Tried that and it says I don't have enough info and my BFF and I joined the same time, but I was a member, before I rejoined.

Hi Tia.  In order to receive a video, you'll need to have uploaded or been tagged in a certain amount of content during your time on Facebook. If you have enough content that meets the standard to generate a video, you'll see the video at the top of your News Feed. -Hannah
Thanks, guess I am just more causes of who I accept as friends!
Had a lot wackos on FB.
How much?  What about the Hi Tia or have a good day greetings, same rules aply to sending greeting?

Facebook my husband joined December 30 and he's never been tagged on anything. So I have also had my account at 8 years advice tagged and been tagged tens of dozens more than most of my friends. So I want my Friends Day video.
I still don't have mine. It's crap. Not right.
